title: How to Make Vodka Infused Oranges

steps.headline: Place the oranges on a cutting board and cut the top and the bottom off the oranges using a chef’s knife.
Cut the peel, including the white pith, from the outside of the oranges.
Slice out the freshly wedges of the oranges, one segment at a time.
Place the orange flesh in a small, sterile jar.
Pour the vodka over the oranges until the jar is full.
Place the lid on the jar and twist the lid until it has formed an airtight seal.
Marinate the oranges in the vodka for 2 to 4 hours, either on the countertop or in the refrigerator.
Empty the jar through a sieve into a bowl.
steps.description: The vodka will go into the bowl, and the oranges will remain in the sieve.

text: Supreme the oranges Place the oranges on a cutting board and cut the top and the bottom off the oranges using a chef’s knife.  Cut the peel, including the white pith, from the outside of the oranges.  Slice out the freshly wedges of the oranges, one segment at a time.  Discard the membranes and peels.  Place the orange flesh in a small, sterile jar.  Infuse the oranges Pour the vodka over the oranges until the jar is full.  Place the lid on the jar and twist the lid until it has formed an airtight seal.  Marinate the oranges in the vodka for 2 to 4 hours, either on the countertop or in the refrigerator.  Empty the jar through a sieve into a bowl. The vodka will go into the bowl, and the oranges will remain in the sieve.
sentences: Supreme the oranges Place the oranges on a cutting board and cut the top and the bottom off the oranges using a chef’s knife.
Cut the peel, including the white pith, from the outside of the oranges.
Slice out the freshly wedges of the oranges, one segment at a time.
Place the orange flesh in a small, sterile jar.
Infuse the oranges Pour the vodka over the oranges until the jar is full.
Place the lid on the jar and twist the lid until it has formed an airtight seal.
Marinate the oranges in the vodka for 2 to 4 hours, either on the countertop or in the refrigerator.
Empty the jar through a sieve into a bowl.
The vodka will go into the bowl, and the oranges will remain in the sieve.
